description:
Turns out the Dani Daniels has an issue: she is terrified of the cane. Fortunately for her, Training of O is here to help her get over it.
When slave trainer Roman Nomar learns of Dani's fear, we know exactly where this shoot is going: psychological domination and fear play with a good dose or hard cock sucking and pussy fucking.
title: Dani's Fears, Day Two
